data.message: Lmao at all the people who claim to love GOD but are so fast to say hateful things, last time I checked  GOD  spokes of love and only he can judge. #bigots

replies.message: Yeah not really don't preach to me, I could really careless. Thanks

Oh please the bible say alot of things are sin like sex before marriage eating pig seafood etc but most of you people pick and choose what rules to follow , what I do in my life doesn't effect you , i have freedom to choose so why do you care and try to pass judgement ! Such hypocrites

"Just because you are saved/Christian, doesn't mean you won't say something that's not nice, it just means you have found God's forgiveness without having to slaughter an infidel to get it" Well you kind of do actually: "Thou shalt not delay to offer the first of thy ripe fruits, and of thy liquors: the firstborn of thy sons shalt thou give unto me." (Exodus 22:29) Now if you could take a picture of that in support of your god, that would be great...
